name: Better TRIRIGA
description:
Improves TRIRIGA Appearance. Uses a more legible font. Improved appearance of inputs, forms, buttons.

This style sheet works best with the style provided with the 3.5 platform.
additional_info:
v15

* Improved tab appearance. A text color is forced. Better hover appearance.

v14

* Where background is set, set the foreground color to contrasting colors.

v13

* Do not hide Personalize button
* Do not hide Add and Remove State transition attributes buttons
* Better styling of Label Manager Export, Comparison buttons

v12

* Improve login page appearance
* Fix Data Modeler button sizes on Firefox.
